We refer to Wikipedia articles on politics for help. In the early part of the interview, Newt Gingrich supports a mandate that requires individuals to have health insurance and proposes a voucher system to help them pay for it. However, in later parts of the interview, he expresses opposition to government-mandated health insurance and instead advocates for voluntary, choice-based reforms.

Therefore, the answer is (A).

We refer to Wikipedia articles on public relations for help. In the beginning, Newt Gingrich expresses skepticism about environmental issues, but by the end of the clip, he has fully embraced the idea of mandatory emissions caps and supports government intervention in the market.

Therefore, the answer is (D).
